special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
Whenever you’re dealt damage, for each 1 damage dealt to you, put a defense counter on Into Agadeem unless you pay 1 life for each counter that would be put on it.
Whenever Into Agadeem is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 2
You can’t lose the game and your opponents can’t win the game.
[b]Defeated[/b] Level 3
​
